direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods configure the next Option to have an argument, but 'hasOptionalArg' makes it optional.
Both methods configure the next Option to have arguments, but 'hasOptionalArg' makes them optional.
Both methods configure the next Option's requirement status, but 'hasOptionalArg' focuses on argument optionality.
Both methods directly influence the optional argument status of the next Option.
Both methods handle the configuration of optional arguments with similar control flows.
Both methods handle the configuration of optional arguments with similar control flows and parameter handling.
The 'create' method uses the 'optionalArg' flag set by 'hasOptionalArg' to create the Option instance.
